languages.text: "Я дал обет — не причинять вреда телесного мирянам. Омниссия дарует нам мощь Истинной плоти не для того, чтобы мы вредили слабым и слепым созданиям, коими являются не вкусившие знания Его".

"I took a vow that I would never inflict physical harm upon laypeople. The Omnissiah grants us the power of the True Flesh for a purpose other than damaging the frail and blind creatures that are all who have not yet tasted His knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Я дал обет — не причинять вреда телесного мирянам. Омниссия дарует нам мощь Истинной плоти не для того, чтобы мы вредили слабым и слепым созданиям, коими являются не вкусившие знания Его".

traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「私は世俗の人々に身体的危害を加えないと誓いを立てた。万機神が真の肉体の力を我々に授けたのは、未だその叡智を知らぬ弱者や盲目の生物を傷つけるためではない」
languages.original_text: "I took a vow that I would never inflict physical harm upon laypeople. The Omnissiah grants us the power of the True Flesh for a purpose other than damaging the frail and blind creatures that are all who have not yet tasted His knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「私は世俗の人々に身体的危害を加えないと誓いを立てた。万機神が真の肉体の力を我々に授けたのは、未だその叡智を知らぬ弱者や盲目の生物を傷つけるためではない」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “我曾发过誓，绝不会以任何物理形式伤害教外人士。欧姆尼塞亚赐予我们实肉的力量，绝对不是为了让我们伤害还没有品尝到祂知识的那些盲目、脆弱的生物。”
languages.original_text: "I took a vow that I would never inflict physical harm upon laypeople. The Omnissiah grants us the power of the True Flesh for a purpose other than damaging the frail and blind creatures that are all who have not yet tasted His knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “我曾发过誓，绝不会以任何物理形式伤害教外人士。欧姆尼塞亚赐予我们实肉的力量，绝对不是为了让我们伤害还没有品尝到祂知识的那些盲目、脆弱的生物。”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Ich habe einen Eid abgelegt, dass ich Laien niemals körperlichen Schaden zufüge. Der Omnissiah gewährt uns die Macht des Wahren Fleischs nicht, um den schwachen und blinden Geschöpfen zu schaden, die noch nicht von seinem Wissen gekostet haben."
languages.original_text: "I took a vow that I would never inflict physical harm upon laypeople. The Omnissiah grants us the power of the True Flesh for a purpose other than damaging the frail and blind creatures that are all who have not yet tasted His knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einen Eid abgelegt, dass ich Laien niemals körperlichen Schaden zufüge. Der Omnissiah gewährt uns die Macht des Wahren Fleischs nicht, um den schwachen und blinden Geschöpfen zu schaden, die noch nicht von seinem Wissen gekostet haben."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « J'ai juré ne jamais blesser les profanes. Le pouvoir de la chair véritable qui nous est conféré par l'Omnimessie n'a pas pour vocation de nuire aux créatures frêles et aveugles qui ne jouissent pas encore de Sa connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "I took a vow that I would never inflict physical harm upon laypeople. The Omnissiah grants us the power of the True Flesh for a purpose other than damaging the frail and blind creatures that are all who have not yet tasted His knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai juré ne jamais blesser les profanes. Le pouvoir de la chair véritable qui nous est conféré par l'Omnimessie n'a pas pour vocation de nuire aux créatures frêles et aveugles qui ne jouissent pas encore de Sa connaissance. »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «Juré que jamás infligiría daño físico a los seglares. El Omnissiah no nos concede el poder de la Verdadera Carne con el propósito de dañar a las frágiles y ciegas criaturas que son quienes aún no han saboreado Su conocimiento».
languages.original_text: "I took a vow that I would never inflict physical harm upon laypeople. The Omnissiah grants us the power of the True Flesh for a purpose other than damaging the frail and blind creatures that are all who have not yet tasted His knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «Juré que jamás infligiría daño físico a los seglares. El Omnissiah no nos concede el poder de la Verdadera Carne con el propósito de dañar a las frágiles y ciegas criaturas que son quienes aún no han saboreado Su conocimiento».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Ne olursa olsun avam kesime fiziksel hasar vermeyeceğime yemin ettim. Hermesih'in bize Salt Suret'in kudretini bahşetmesinin, O'nun irfanını tatma şerefine henüz nail olmamış narin ve kör yaratıklara zarar vermekten başka bir sebebi var."
languages.original_text: "I took a vow that I would never inflict physical harm upon laypeople. The Omnissiah grants us the power of the True Flesh for a purpose other than damaging the frail and blind creatures that are all who have not yet tasted His knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Ne olursa olsun avam kesimine fiziksel hasar vermeyeceğime yemin ettim. Hermesih'in bize Salt Suret'in kudretini bahşetmesinin, O'nun irfanını tatma şerefine henüz nail olmamış narin ve kör yaratıklara zarar vermekten başka bir sebebi var."
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
